about_the_game:
Land Drifters is a game about exploring new islands, leveling up new skills, and unlocks through progression!

The world is set in a medieval-style setting with many trade-skills to help you progress through the game. Mine precious ore and craft your strongest armor, battle against monsters to unlock new areas to explore. Claim your ship and set sail and drift to new lands to uncover their story with plenty of mysteries to uncover!

Over 100 skills and masteries to level up. Whether fishing mighty beasts, working with specific metals in smithing, honing your swordsmanship, or obtaining poison resistance through exposure, there will be a lot for you to enjoy and progress.

There are also plenty of side activities to keep you busy if you choose. Claim rewards with optional cosmetic currency to spend in the game. Many of these activities range from fun games or educational, like learning languages, typing challenges, and more!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 and later
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Graphics: DX10+ Capable GPUs
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Land Drifters is an incremental RPG game that can be played idle or active. Explore islands, unlock new skills and combat classes, overcome obstacles, and more! The game is jam-packed with many paths of progression intertwined throughout the game!
